ATAAY.summary: AtacadÃ£o S.A. engages in the wholesale and retail of food and other products in Brazil. The company operates through Retail, Cash & Carry, and Financial Solutions segments. It offers cold cuts and dairy products, beverages, preserves and canned goods, and sweets and biscuits, as well as personal hygiene, cleaning, bazaar, pet line, automotive, and other products through a chain of cash and carry stores, hypermarkets, supermarkets, convenience stores, gas stations, drug stores, and e-commerce under the Carrefour and AtacadÃ£o brands. As of December 31, 2018, it operated 193 stores, which include cash and carry, and wholesale stores; and 100 hypermarkets, 50 supermarkets, and 120 proximity stores. The company also provides consumer loans, as well as other products, such as insurance policies. AtacadÃ£o S.A. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.
